name: Obsession (itch) (Thorn)
description:
Obsession is a game where you play as a schoolgirl named Akari. Akari likes her best friend Nishiki but there's a few obstacles between her and her beloved, the girls who you think have a crush on him. Don't let them get in the way, do whatever it takes to get rid of them, even if it means killing them.

The game will feature a 3D environment, stealth mechanic based gameplay, a diverse cast of characters, and much more. If you would like to support the game please join the discord and maybe even volunteer.

https://discord.gg/tsRHdwukZd
